welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Great Dunmow, the charming town known for its historic architecture and quaint countryside. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all this wonderful city has to offer. Have a fantastic time in Great Dunmow!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cambridge Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Southend Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private and executive jets, offering a more exclusive and personalized experience.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal handles all freight and cargo operations at Southend Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, simply connect to the designated network and follow the prompts to access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private jet passengers, offering luxury amenities and services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
